title: Urgente!!! Nombre de tipografía
content:
Hello friends, I need the name of a typeface. It is found in this website: [http://www.puntomedia.es](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141049/http:/www.puntomedia.es/ "http://www.puntomedia.es"). is the logo where it says half point colored squares. I uploaded an image to postd, if you do not want to go anywhere that I write them. I ask for help, I need it very urgently. Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_6326.png)
author: mewember

comments.content: Please post type ID requests in the proper forum: [TypeID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141049/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid)

Chalet (NewYorkNineteenSeventy) from House-Industries

If you post again use [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141049/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid") for font IDs
Thank you very much from Spain. A pleasure to have known this forum. a hug

please, what are this fonts?  
thanks!
